data.title: Pope tells women to feel free to breastfeed in church
Truck rammed into pedestrians in 'terrorist attack' in Jerusalem
Yemeni woman who campaigned for female literacy shot dead
Last heir to former Ottoman Empire, Prince Bayezid Osman dies at age 92
Turkey to replace Google, Gmail with domestic providers 'aligned with local culture, values'
China has announced plans to set up an "environmental police" force tasked with enforcing pollution restrictions across the capital Beijing in a bid to improve the city's notorious air quality.

Uber has suffered another setback to its operational model in Europe after a Swiss insurance agency ruled that Uber drivers are employees, not freelance contractors as the company claims — meaning it must pay social security contributions.
